description:
This top tube pack is for riders who want extra storage capacity without having to do without their water bottles. The waterproof construction keeps your food, tools and bikepacking gear dry on long tours and adventure riding through nasty weather. If the Chilcotins are calling, this compact frame pack also fits on many full-suspension mountain bikes with limited triangle space, so you can spend more time in the mountains before running out of supplies.Waterproof polyurethane-coated nylon ripstop fabric.IP64 waterproof rating is good for rainy weather.Adjustable hook-and-loop mounting straps.Rolltop closure.Reflective logo keeps you visible.Can be used on carbon bikes.

        Sustainability











PVC Free












                      PVC free
name: Ortlieb Bikepacking Frame Pack Toptube
